theme: Trending Batch 3 — Real Feb 2026 Trends Across Niches
characterDescription: Isaiah, a charismatic Black man in his late 20s with a warm smile, wearing a casual hoodie and gold chain, expressive and humorous

movies.title: TAKING CARE OF BUSINESS
movies.captionIdea: But you're on your phone… no, I'm taking care of business 💼📱 #TakingCareOfBusiness

videos.title: Taking Care of Business
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sits on a modern couch scrolling his phone, wearing casual hoodie and gold chain. Someone off-camera gestures accusingly. He smirks confidently, then camera flips to show his phone filled with code, analytics dashboards, and scheduling apps. Dramatic lighting shift from warm to cool blue tech glow. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: REALITY TV EDIT: MY CODING LIFE
movies.captionIdea: Previously on 'The Real Developers of Atlanta'… 🎬😭 #RealityTVEdit #DevLife

videos.title: Part 1 — The Setup
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks into a cluttered home office wearing hoodie and gold chain. Dramatic reality TV music. Camera does aggressive zoom-ins on his face staring at red error messages on laptop. A chyron appears: '3 hours earlier…' He picks up a coffee mug with a defeated look. Moody confessional-style lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Drama
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree paces dramatically while screen shows failing tests. Cut to confessional-style talking head where he looks directly at camera explaining the bug with intense hand gestures. His casual hoodie and gold chain catch dramatic side-lighting. Quick cuts between stressed face, screen, and hands typing furiously. Reality TV freeze-frames and pauses. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Resolution
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree types one final line of code and hits enter. Green check marks cascade across screen. He stands, arms raised in triumph. His casual hoodie and gold chain gleam in bright celebration lighting. Dramatic victory music swells. Freeze frame with text 'Coming up next season…' Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: ASKING THE UNIVERSE FOR A SIGN
movies.captionIdea: I asked the universe for a sign and it said 'build the app' ☁️💻 #UniverseSign #Manifestation

videos.title: Universe Sign
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree stands outside looking up at a beautiful blue sky, wearing hoodie and gold chain. Expression is searching and hopeful. Camera tilts up to reveal clouds magically forming into a laptop and code symbols. Warm golden hour lighting on his face. He nods with satisfaction and pulls out his phone. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: PRIMADONNA GLOW-UP
movies.captionIdea: Primadonna boy — all I ever wanted was the world 🌍✨ #GlowUp #Primadonna

videos.title: Primadonna Glow-Up
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree first appears in a dimly lit room with a basic laptop, looking determined but scrappy in a plain t-shirt. Flash transition — now in a sleek modern office wearing signature hoodie and gold chain, surrounded by multiple monitors showing dashboards. Posture shifts from hunched to confident. Cinematic lighting from cold to warm golden. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: GLASS HALF FULL: TECH EDITION
movies.captionIdea: Pessimist: 'it has bugs.' Optimist: 'it compiles.' Founder: 'ship it.' 😂 #GlassHalfFull #DevHumor

videos.title: Part 1 — Pessimist
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree in dark hoodie, arms crossed, looking disappointed at a laptop showing half-finished app. Text overlay 'The Pessimist.' Shakes head, pointing out bugs with dramatic frowns. Moody blue lighting. Gold chain catches minimal light. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — Optimist
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree transforms energy — same laptop but now smiling in a colorful hoodie, gold chain shining. Text overlay 'The Optimist.' Gestures enthusiastically at working features. Warm golden lighting fills the room. Double thumbs up to camera. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — The Founder
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree appears with sunglasses, hoodie and gold chain, radiating CEO energy. Text overlay 'The Founder.' Barely glances at screen, waves dismissively, walks away confidently grabbing car keys. Dramatic red and purple lighting with lens flares. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: RUCKING: FITNESS TREND TAKEOVER
movies.captionIdea: Rucking is the new running and I'm about that life 🎒💪 #Rucking #FitnessTrend

videos.title: Part 1 — Discovery
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree on couch in hoodie and gold chain, discovers rucking videos on phone. Eyes widen. Stands up, opens package revealing a weighted rucking vest. Holds it up excitedly to camera. Bright living room with natural sunlight. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Walk
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks on a scenic outdoor trail wearing weighted rucking vest over hoodie. Camera captures multiple angles — side profile, front showing effort, overhead of the path. Morning golden hour through trees. Sweat on forehead. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Results
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree back home, exhausted but proud, drops vest on floor and collapses on couch. Grins at camera, gives thumbs up, grabs protein shake and takes a victorious sip. Warm afternoon lighting. Hoodie slightly disheveled, gold chain still on. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: INTERVAL WALKING CHALLENGE
movies.captionIdea: Japanese interval walking is the simplest hack 🚶‍♂️⚡ #IntervalWalking #FitTok

videos.title: Interval Walking
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks on a tree-lined sidewalk in athletic gear with gold chain. Alternates between power-walking with arms pumping and casual strolling. Speed ramps match pace changes. Fitness tracker glows on wrist. Morning light creates long shadows. Checks watch approvingly. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: SIDE HUSTLE STACK 2026
movies.captionIdea: My side hustle stack makes my 9-5 look like pocket change 💰🔥 #SideHustle #2026Money

videos.title: Part 1 — The Problem
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at desk in hoodie and gold chain, looking at bills on laptop showing red numbers. Rubs temples stressed. Dim moody lighting. Opens notes app and starts brainstorming. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Build
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree works energetically across multiple screens — Shopify store, social analytics, app code. Quick cuts between screens, focused face, hands typing. Energetic blue and purple lighting. Time-lapse day to night. Hoodie and gold chain consistent. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — The Results
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree leans back satisfied, screens showing green profit numbers and growing charts. Pulls up phone showing payment notifications stacking. Warm golden light. His casual hoodie and gold chain catch the glow. Knowing nod at camera. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: CLAP IF YOU'RE AGAINST IT
movies.trend: Clap If Youre Against It Audio (Feb 16 2026)
movies.captionIdea: Clap if you're against subscription fatigue 👏💀 #ClapIfYoureAgainstIt

videos.title: Clap Against It
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree in modern living room, hoodie and gold chain, casual but mischievous. Speaks to camera with a knowing grin making a bold statement about subscription apps. Reacts with exaggerated shock and satisfaction as if hearing thunderous applause. Eyes go wide, nods emphatically. Dynamic lighting with punchy shadows. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: GROUP CONSENSUS: TECH DEBATE
movies.captionIdea: When the squad can't agree on what language to learn 😂💻 #GroupConsensus #CodeLife

videos.title: Part 1 — Voice of Reason
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks into frame in slow motion from the left, hoodie and gold chain, looking serious. Delivers a measured logical tech take with calm gestures. Clean minimal workspace background. Slow-motion at 0.5 speed makes him look dramatically serious. Cool professional lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Enabler
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree enters from right in slow motion, different colored hoodie, same gold chain. Encouraging and excited, hyping up camera with big gestures and nodding. The enabler who agrees with whatever chaos is coming. Slow-mo makes enthusiasm hilariously intense. Warm energetic lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Agent of Chaos
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree slides into frame in slow motion wearing sunglasses, hoodie and gold chain. Delivers a wildcard tech take with maximum swagger — arms wide, head tilted, zero self-doubt. Absurd but sold completely. Dramatic red and purple lighting. Every gesture looks like a movie scene. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: SORA AI MEETS REAL LIFE
movies.trend: AI Video Generation Virality (Sora + Disney Feb 2026)
movies.captionIdea: When AI turns your imagination into reality 🤖🎬 #SoraAI #AIVideo

videos.title: Part 1 — The Vision
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sketches ideas on a notepad at his desk, hoodie and gold chain. Deep creative thought. Camera over his shoulder at concept art and storyboards. Soft warm desk lamp glow. Looks up with an excited 'watch this' expression. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — Generation
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree types a prompt into a glowing AI interface. Camera captures focused face illuminated by blue screen light, hoodie and gold chain visible. Digital particles swirl around screen as AI processes. Eyes reflect screen glow. Futuristic blue and purple lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — The Result
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree watches as stunning AI-generated video plays on screen — his sketch brought to life. Jaw drops, leans back in amazement, breaks into huge smile. Turns to camera with pure excitement. Hoodie and gold chain glow in colorful screen light. Room fills with vibrant reflections. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: ANTI-HUSTLE MORNING ROUTINE
movies.captionIdea: My anti-hustle morning that still makes money 🌅💰 #AntiHustle #MorningRoutine

videos.title: Part 1 — Slow Morning
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree wakes naturally, stretching peacefully in bed. Gold chain on nightstand. Soft morning sunlight through curtains. No rush. Makes pour-over coffee slowly, savoring it. Warm golden morning light. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — Intentional Work
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at workspace in hoodie and gold chain, coffee in hand. Opens one focused task. Works calmly, efficiently — no multitasking. Takes a mindful break looking out window. Natural daylight. Peaceful but productive. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Freedom
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree closes laptop at noon with satisfied smile. Phone shows completed tasks and revenue notifications. Puts on hoodie, heads outside for a walk in sunshine. Relaxed, fulfilled expression. Made money and has his afternoon free. Bright warm outdoor lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: BIOHACKING MY FOCUS
movies.captionIdea: Biohacking my brain for 10x coding focus 🧠⚡ #Biohacking #Focus #Nootropics

videos.title: Biohacking Focus
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree in clean kitchen, hoodie and gold chain, examining supplement bottles on counter. Picks one up, reads label curiously, takes it with water. Quick cut to desk — split screen of 'before' distracted scrolling vs 'after' laser-focused coding. Bright clinical lighting transitions to focused blue. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: LIVE SOCIAL SHOPPING HOST
movies.captionIdea: Live shopping host is the side hustle nobody talks about 🛍️💸 #TikTokShop #LiveShopping

videos.title: Live Shopping
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sets up ring light and phone tripod, hoodie and gold chain. Goes live, transforms into energetic shopping host — holding up tech gadgets, demonstrating features with big personality. Phone screen shows viewers and comments flooding in. Dynamic ring light lighting. Checks sale notifications with excited reactions. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: SUPER BOWL PARTY TECH SETUP
movies.captionIdea: The tech bro Super Bowl setup nobody asked for 🏈📺 #SuperBowl #TechSetup

videos.title: Part 1 — The Plan
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks into empty living room in hoodie and gold chain. Pulls out phone showing mood board of ultimate tech watch party. Gestures at room mapping placement. Bright daytime lighting. Excited planning energy. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Build
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree mounts a massive TV, sets up surround sound speakers, arranges smart lights. Hoodie and gold chain. Time-lapse of the room transforming with snack stations and screens. He tests the sound system with a big bass hit, flinching then grinning. Energetic montage lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Game Time
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sits back on the couch surrounded by the fully set up tech paradise — massive screen, LED strips glowing team colors, surround sound, snack spread. Hoodie and gold chain. He picks up a controller for the pre-game, surrounded by friends arriving. Warm party lighting with colored LED accents. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: SNACK-SIZED WORKOUT
movies.captionIdea: 5-min micro workouts between coding sessions 💪🖥️ #SnackSizedWorkout #DeskFitness

videos.title: Snack-Sized Workout
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at his desk coding, then suddenly stands up for a quick 5-minute micro workout — push-ups against the desk, squats, stretches. Hoodie and gold chain. Quick energetic cuts between exercises. Returns to desk refreshed and re-energized. Split lighting between workspace warm and exercise cool. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: CREATOR ECONOMY MONEY BREAKDOWN
movies.trend: How Creators Make Money 2026 (The Next Tech)
movies.captionIdea: How I actually make money as a tech creator in 2026 ��📊 #CreatorEconomy #MoneyBreakdown

videos.title: Part 1 — Revenue Streams
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at a whiteboard in hoodie and gold chain, drawing out revenue stream diagram. Markers in hand, breaking down income sources — sponsorships, digital products, SaaS. Camera captures the whiteboard filling up. Clean bright lighting. Teaching energy. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Numbers
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at his computer pulling up real dashboards showing earnings. Quick cuts between Stripe, analytics, and affiliate platforms. Hoodie and gold chain. Expression shifts from casual to impressed at certain numbers. Screen glow illuminates his face. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — The Strategy
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree back at whiteboard circling the top earners. Points at camera explaining the strategy with confidence. Hoodie and gold chain catch the light. Draws arrows connecting revenue streams. Steps back to reveal the full master plan on the board. Bright motivated lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: MESH WIFI ROUTER UPGRADE
movies.captionIdea: Upgrading to mesh WiFi changed my whole automation setup 📶🏠 #MeshWifi #SmartHome #TechUpgrade

videos.title: Mesh WiFi Upgrade
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree unboxes sleek mesh WiFi routers at his desk, hoodie and gold chain. Sets them up around the house — one in office, one in living room, one upstairs. Camera shows speed test before (slow) vs after (blazing fast). His reaction goes from frustrated to ecstatic. Clean tech-focused lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: GRAMMYS TECH-FIT TIER LIST
movies.captionIdea: Rating Grammys outfits but only through a tech bro lens 👔🏆 #Grammys2026 #TierList #FashionTech

videos.title: Grammys Tier List
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sits in front of his desk in hoodie and gold chain, reacting to Grammy outfits on his screen. Makes exaggerated faces — impressed, shocked, confused. Holds up number cards rating each look. Quick cuts between outfits and his animated reactions. Bright colorful lighting matching Grammy energy. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: SHUT UP MOM: CODING EDITION
movies.captionIdea: Me at 12 when my mom said 'get off the computer' and I was learning to code 💻🤫 #ShutUpMom #KeyAndPeele #CodingKid

videos.title: Shut Up Mom
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree lip-syncs with full bratty teenager energy in his hoodie and gold chain. Eye rolls, dismissive hand gestures, dramatic turn away from camera. On-screen text: 'me at 12 when my mom told me to stop playing on the computer but I was actually learning HTML.' Commits fully to the petulant delivery. Warm bedroom-style lighting with nostalgic color grade. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: THERMOSTAT GAME: CODE TEMPERATURE
movies.captionIdea: Guess the temperature of my codebase 🌡️💃 #ThermostatGame #CodeQuality

videos.title: Thermostat Game
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree does a playful dance in his room wearing hoodie and gold chain. He reveals a 'code quality thermostat' on screen that goes from 'freezing cold spaghetti code' to 'fire clean architecture.' His dance intensity matches the temperature reading. Fun colorful lighting that shifts with the thermostat. Energetic and silly. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: EUPHORIA GLAM: TECH EDITION
movies.captionIdea: The coding-to-going-out transition that took 5 minutes 🌟✨ #EuphoriaGlam #Transition #GetReady

videos.title: Euphoria Glam Transition
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree starts in his workspace looking tired in a plain hoodie, eyes heavy from coding. Flash transition — he's now styled up with gold chain gleaming, fresh outfit, confidence radiating, walking out the door. The transition is smooth and cinematic with sparkle effects and dramatic lighting change from blue screen glow to warm golden going-out lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: PRODUCTIVITY CYCLES HACK
movies.captionIdea: Working WITH your energy cycles, not against them 🔄⚡ #ProductivityCycles #EnergyManagement

videos.title: Part 1 — Low Energy Day
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at desk in hoodie and gold chain, clearly low energy. Moves slowly, stares at screen. Instead of forcing deep work, he does light admin — emails, organizing files. Camera captures the intentional rest. Soft muted lighting matching the low-key mood. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — Peak Energy Day
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at same desk but radiating energy. Hoodie and gold chain. Typing fast, switching between apps, building features. Camera shows rapid productivity with energetic cuts. Bright dynamic lighting. He's in flow state, barely looking away from screen. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — The System
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at a whiteboard drawing his energy cycle calendar. Hoodie and gold chain. Maps out which tasks go on which energy days. Steps back revealing the full system. Points at camera with a knowing smile. Clean bright teaching lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: AI DIGITAL COLLECTIBLES HUSTLE
movies.captionIdea: Using AI to create and sell digital collectibles is insane ��💰 #DigitalCollectibles #AIArt #SideHustle

videos.title: AI Collectibles
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree at his desk in hoodie and gold chain, generating digital art collectibles with AI on his screen. Camera shows the creation process — typing prompts, watching art generate, curating a collection. He holds up his phone showing a marketplace listing with sales notifications. Expression shifts from creative focus to excited at the numbers. Colorful screen-lit workspace. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

movies.title: FULL BODY SCAN EXPERIENCE
movies.captionIdea: Got the viral full-body scan and the results were wild 🔬🧬 #FullBodyScan #Biohacking #HealthTech

videos.title: Part 1 — Arriving
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree walks into a sleek modern health clinic wearing his hoodie and gold chain. Camera captures the high-tech interior with scanning equipment. He looks around impressed and slightly nervous. Clean clinical white and blue lighting. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 2 — The Scan
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree lies on a futuristic scanning bed as technology moves around him. Hoodie and gold chain visible. Blue scanning lights pass over his body. His expression shifts between curiosity and awe. The room glows with medical tech lighting. Camera captures the high-tech equipment in motion. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.

videos.title: Part 3 — Results
videos.prompt: @isaiahdupree sits with a doctor looking at scan results on a tablet. Hoodie and gold chain. His face shows surprise, relief, and determination as he sees the data. He nods, stands up confidently, walks out into sunlight. The lighting transitions from clinical blue to warm hopeful golden outdoor light. Portrait 9:16, cinematic 4K.
